means: 持球队员突破散开防守区的

sentence.Network_en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentence.Network_cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentence.Network_en: He was the fastest thing I ever saw on a baseball field.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是我在棒球场上见过的跑得最快的家伙。

sentence.Network_en: His jaw was broken after he was hit on the head.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的头部受重击之后下颌骨折了。

list.abs: light up that broken battle field ., 照著那破碎的战场.

means.word_mean: 1. varying in direction suddenly and frequently;

auth_sentence.content: Paupers Field sort of begs for such descriptive language.

auth_sentence.content: So send your broken down PC to somewhere useful.

auth_sentence.content: The drama on the field did not disappoint either.
